name: Diseased Hero
description:
Everyone knows that circles have 2 sides, an inside and an outside, so you have to  PICK A SIDE(proof that I am following the theme) to control at the moment whether it be focusing on defending, the outside from sickness zombies, or the internal immune system, since the virus is airborne. Yeah just don't focus on the story.

Controls:

Arrows:Move the player

Left click: Slash sword in at mouse position

Mouse:Use to aim the sword and move the immune system barrier

S: Switch between battlefield and immune system

Mute button:On most keyboards if you hate the sounds

Close Tab: Should appear as an x on the tab if you think the game is that bad
